subject: Re: JUnit4 and Threads
msgSnippet: Here are the two references I pursued: http://www.cs.rice.edu/~mgricken/research/concutest/concjunit/ This looked interesting, but I wasn t quite ready to take
messageBody:
Here are the two references I pursued:

http://www.cs.rice.edu/~mgricken/research/concutest/concjunit/

This looked interesting, but I wasn't quite ready to take on trying to get this integrated with my Eclipse environment.

http://www.javaworld.com/jw-12-2000/jw-1221-junit.html?page=6

The last section on this page, "Test Thread Safety", gave me something that was easy to get working with Eclipse. I would work on getting this working with JUnit4, but suspect that others have figured all this out already.

Any pointers appreciated !

-Chuck Mosher
